Description_lang: Your spells and abilities have a chance to $?a137024[cause a Revival that heals for ${$297850s1*(1+($296326m2/100))}]?a137007[summon $296325s5 Army of the Dead ghouls for ${$296325m4/1000+$299368m2/1000} sec]?a137012[cause an immediate burst of Tranquility's healing effect]?a137031[cause an immediate burst of Divine Hymn's healing effect]?a137023[Invoke Niuzao, the Black Ox, for ${$m1+$296326m1}% of its base duration]?a137010[activate Incarnation: Guardian of Ursoc for ${$m1+$296326m1}% of its base duration][activate $@spelldesc297745 for ${$m1+$296326m1}% of its base duration].$?a137044[ This Demonic Tyrant only extends your other demons by ${$m2/1000}.1 sec.]?a137043[This Darkglare only extends your damage over time effects by ${$m3/1000}.1 sec.][]When the Vision of Perfection activates, you and up to $303342s1 other nearby allies gain $303342s2 Haste for $303344d.

description_blz.en_US:
Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate Arcane Power for 35% of its base duration.

When the Vision of Perfection activates, you and up to 2 other nearby allies gain 4 Haste for 10 sec.
description_blz.es_MX:
Tus hechizos y habilidades tienen la probabilidad de activar Poder arcano por un 35% de su duración básica.

Cuando la Visión de perfección se activa, tú y hasta 2 aliados cercanos más obtienen 4 p. de celeridad durante 10 s.
description_blz.pt_BR:
Seus feitiços e suas habilidades têm chance de ativar Poder Arcano por 35% da duração básica.

Quando a Visão da Perfeição é ativada, você e até 2 aliados próximos ganham 4 de Aceleração por 10 s.
description_blz.de_DE:
Eure Zauber und Fähigkeiten haben eine Chance, 'Arkane Kraft' für 35% der Grunddauer zu aktivieren.

Wenn 'Vision der Perfektion' aktiviert wird, erhaltet Ihr und bis zu 2 Verbündete in der Nähe 10 Sek. lang 4 Tempo.
description_blz.en_GB:
Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate Arcane Power for 35% of its base duration.

When the Vision of Perfection activates, you and up to 2 other nearby allies gain 4 Haste for 10 sec.
description_blz.es_ES:
Tus hechizos y facultades tienen una probabilidad de activar Poder Arcano durante un 35% de su duración base.

Cuando Visión de perfección se activa, un máximo de 2 aliados cercanos y tú obtenéis 4 p. de celeridad durante 10 s.
description_blz.fr_FR:
Vos sorts et techniques ont une chance d’activer Pouvoir des Arcanes pendant 35% de sa durée de base.

À l’activation de Vision de perfection, vous et jusqu’à 2 alliés proches voyez votre Hâte augmentée de 4 pendant 10 s.
description_blz.it_IT:
Gli incantesimi e le abilità hanno una probabilità di attivare Potere Arcano per il 35% della sua durata base.

Quando Visione della Perfezione si attiva, aumenta l'indice di celerità tuo e di massimo 2 alleati vicini di 4 per 10 s.
description_blz.ru_RU:
Заклинания и способности могут активировать эффект ""Мощь тайной магии"" на 35% базовой длительности.

После активации "Видение совершенства" на 10 сек. повышает вашу скорость и скорость максимум 2 находящихся рядом союзников на 4.
description_blz.ko_KR:
주문과 능력 사용 시 일정 확률로 신비의 마법 강화가 기본 지속시간의 35% 동안 활성화됩니다.

완벽의 환영이 활성화되면 자신과 근처에 있는 아군 최대 2명까지 10초 동안 가속이 4만큼 증가합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW:
你的法術和技能有一定機率啟動秘法強化，持續時間相當於基礎持續時間的35%

當完美視界啟動時，你和最多其他2名附近的盟友獲得4點加速，持續10秒。
description_blz.zh_CN:
你的法术和技能有几率激活奥术强化，持续时间为正常情况的35%。

当完美愿景激活时，你与周围最多2名盟友获得4急速，持续10秒。
